cast.name: 艾米莉·格拉斯利 Emily Graslie

trans_title: 十分钟速成课：大历史 第一季
introduction: John and Hank Green go over the history of the universe in a fun and exciting way.Episodes include…大爆炸 The Big Bang: Crash Course Big History #1探索宇宙 Exploring the Universe: Crash Course Big History #2太阳与地球 The Sun & The Earth: Crash Course Big History #3生命 Life Begins: Crash Course Big History #4进化的史诗 The Evolutionary Epic: Crash Course Big History #5人类进化 Human Evolution: Crash Course Big History #6迁徙与强化 Migrations and Intensification: Crash Course Big History #7现代革命 The Modern Revolution: Crash Course Big History #8人类世与不远的未来 The Anthropocene and the Near Future: Crash Course Big History #9深入未来 The Deep Future: Crash Course Big History #10
chinese_title: 十分钟速成课：大历史 第一季
